conbody.p: As prescribed in 1816.406-70(d), insert the following clause:
The target cost of this contract is $______. The target fee of this contract is $______. The total target cost and target fee as contemplated by the Incentive Fee clause of this contract are $______.
The cost sharing for cost underruns is: Government ____ percent; Contractor ____ percent.
The cost sharing for cost overruns is: Government ____ percent; Contractor ____ percent.
